name: Lollypop
body:
# Lollypop is a new GNOME music playing application.

It provides:
*  mp3/4, ogg and flac.
*  Genre/Cover browsing
*  Genre/Artist/Cover browsing
*  Search
*  Queue
*  Party mode
*  Replay gain
*  Cover art downloader
*  Context artist view

Changes in 0.8.7:
* Rewrite artist view
* Add new queue options

# Depends on:
* gtk3
* intltool (make)
* itstool (make)
* python (make)
* python-cairo
* python-dbus
* python-gobject
* python-mutagen
* python-sqlite

# Installation:
* Archlinux: Available in Aur
* OpenSUSE: https://build.opensuse.org/project/repository_state/home:gnumdk31/openSUSE_13.2
* Fedora: https://copr.fedoraproject.org/coprs/gnumdk/lollypop/
